maqras.text: 19|59|(ivarkalukkup pinnar, ivarkalutaiya cantatiyil) ivarkalutaiya itattai ataintavarkalo carira iccaikalaip pinparri tolukaiyai(t tolatu) vinakki vittarkal. Avarkal (marumaiyil) timaiyaiye (alivaiye) cantipparkal

19|60|ayinum, avarkalil evarkal (kaicetappattu) pavattil iruntu vilaki, nampikkai kontu, narceyalkalaiyum ceykirarkalo avarkal corkkattil nulaivarkal. (Avarkal ataiyaventiya kuliyil) oru ciritum (kuraikkappattu) aniti ilaikkappata mattarkal

19|61|atu ‘atn' ennum enrenrum nilaiyana corkkankalakum. (Avai tarcamayam) maraivaka iruntapotilum, avarrai rahman tan nallatiyarkalukku vakkalittirukkiran. Niccayamaka avanutaiya vakkuruti nataiperre tirum
19|62|(avarril) salam (enra mukamanait) tavira vinana varttaikalaic ceviyura mattarkal. Anku avarkalukkuk kalaiyilum malaiyilum (mikka melana) unavu alikkappatum
19|63|ittakaiya corkkattirku nam atiyarkalil iraiyaccamutaiyavarkalai nam varicakki vituvom

19|64|(Vanavarkal kurukinranar: Napiye!) Umatu iraivanin uttaravinri nam irankuvatillai. Namakku munniruppavaiyum, pinniruppavaiyum, ivvirantirku mattiyil iruppavaiyum avanukke contamanavai. Itil (etaiyum) umatu iraivan marappavanalla

19|65|vanankalaiyum, pumiyaiyum, ivarrirku mattiyil ullavarraiyum pataitta iraivan avane! Atalal, avan oruvanaiye vanankuviraka. Avanai vanankuvatil (umakku erpatum ciramankalai) cakittuk kolviraka. Avanutaiya tanmaikku oppana evaraiyum nir arivira? (Illaiye)
19|66|(ivvarirukka) manitan ‘‘nan iranta pinnar uyir kotuttu eluppappatuvena?'' Enru (parikacamakak) ketkiran
19|67|itarku munnar oru porulakavum illatirunta avanai name manitanaka pataittom enpatai avan ninaittupparkka ventama

19|68|akave, (napiye!) Umatu iraivan mitu cattiyamaka! Avarkalaiyum, (avarkal vanankukira) saittankalaiyum niccayamaka (uyir kotuttu) eluppi narakattaic curri mulantalittavarkalaka avarkalai onru cerppom
19|69|pinnar, rahmanukku maruceyvatil katinamaka irunta anaivaraiyum ovvoru kuttattiliruntu niccayamaka nam pirittu vituvom
19|70|pinnar, narakattil erivatarku takuti utaiyavarkal yar enpatai niccayamaka nam arintu kolvom
19|71|ataik katakkatu unkalil evarume tappivita mutiyatu. Itu umatu iraivanitam mutivu ceyyappatta marra mutiyata tirmanamakum
19|72|anal, iraiyaccattutan valntavarkalai nam patukattuk kolvom. Aniyayakkararkalai (avarkal) mulantalittavarkalaka (irukkum nilaimaiyil) atil tallivituvom

19|73|Nirakarippavarkalukku namatu telivana vacanankal otik kanpikkappattal avarkal nampikkaiyalarkalai nokki ‘‘nam iru vakupparil evarkalutaiya vitu (tarcamayam) melanatakavum alakana torrattutanum irukkiratu?'' Enru ketkinranar
19|74|ivarkalai vita alakana torrattaiyum, tattu muttu camankalaiyum konta ettanaiyo kuttattarai ivarkalukku mun nam alittirukkirom

19|75|(napiye!) Kuruviraka: Evan valikettil irukkirano avanukku erpatta tantanaiyai avan kannal kanum varai rahman avanukku (im'maiyil) tavanaiyalikkiran. (Atai avan kantatan pinnaro) avanukku vetanai kitaikkum. Allatu avanutaiya kalam mutintuvitum. Pinnar, evarutaiya vitu kettatu; evarutaiya kuttam palavinamanatu enpatait tittamaka avarkal (marumaiyil) arintu kolvarkal

19|76|nervali perravarkalukku allah menmelum nervaliyai atikarittu valankukiran. Nilaiyaka irukkakkutiya narceyalkaltan umatu iraivanitattil narkuliyai ataivatarku cirantatakavum, nalla mutivai taruvatarku cirantatakavum irukkinrana
19|77|(napiye!) Nam vacanankalai nirakarittavanai nir parttira? ‘‘(Marumaiyilum) niccayamaka nan eralamana porulkalum cantatikalum kotukkappatuven'' enru kurukiran
19|78|avan (marumaiyil natakkakkutiya) maraivana visayankalai arintu kontana? Allatu rahmanitattil (ittakaiyatoru) vakkurutiyaip perrirukkirana
19|79|(ivan kurukirapati) alla! Ivan (poyyakak) kurukinravarrai nam elutik konte varukirom. (Atarkut takkavaru) avanutaiya vetanaiyaiyum nam atikappatuttivituvom
19|80|avan (tanakkuriyatenru) kurum anaittukkum name varicaki vituvom. Avan (ivarrai vittuvittu) nam'mitam taniyakave varuvan
19|81|(Inaivaittu vanankum) ivarkal tankalukku utaviyaka irukkumenru allah allatavarrait teyvankalaka etuttuk kolkinranar
19|82|avvaralla; atteyvankal ivarkal tankalai vanankiyataiyum nirakarittu, ivarkalukku virotamakavum marivitum
19|83|(napiye!) Nirakarippavarkalai (pavamana kariyankalaic ceyyumpatit) tuntik kontiruppatarkakave saittankalai nam (avarkalitam) anuppivaikkirom enpatai nir kavanikkavillaiya
19|84|atalal, avarkalukkaka (vetanai varaventumenru) nir avacarappatatir. Avarkalukku (vetanai varakkutiya nalkalai) nam ennikkonte irukkirom
19|85|iraiyaccamutaiyavarkalai rahmanitam (viruntalikalaip pola) kulukkalaka nam onru cerkkum nalil
19|86|innum kurravalikalai takattutan narakattin pakkam nam ottukinra nalil
19|87|rahmanitam anumati perravarkalait tavira evarum (evarukkum) ciparicu peca urimai peramattar
19|88|rahman cantati etuttuk kontataka a(nta kiristavarkal, innum inaivaippa)varkal kurukinranar
19|89|(napiye! Avarkalai nokki kuruviraka:) Niccayamaka ninkal periyator apantattaik kurukirirkal
19|90|vanankal kilintu pokavum, pumi pilantu vitavum, malaikal itintu carintu vitavum nerunki vittana
19|91|rahmanukkuc cantati untenru avarkal kuruvatan karanattal
19|92|cantati etuttuk kolvatu rahmanukkut takumanatalla
19|93|enenral, niccayamaka vanankalilum pumiyilum ulla ovvonrum rahmanitam atimaiyakave varukiratu
19|94|avai anaittaiyum avan culntu arintu kanakkittum vaittirukkiran
19|95|avai ovvonrum marumai nalil (evarutaiya utaviyumillamal) avanitam tanittaniyakave varum
19|96|Niccayamaka nampikkai kontu narceyalkal ceykiravarkalai (anaivarum) necikkumpati rahman ceyvan

19|97|(napiye!) Umatu moliyil nam itai (irakki) elitakki vaittatellam, itanmulam iraiyaccamutaiyavarkalukku nir narceyti kuruvatarkum, (vin) vitantavatam ceyyum makkalukku itan mulam nir accamutti eccarikkai ceyvatarkakavume akum
19|98|itarku munnar ettanaiyo kuttattinarai nam alittirukkirom. Avarkalil oruvaraiyenum nir kankirira? Allatu avarkalutaiya ciriya captattaiyenum nir ketkirira
